creator: PT Visionet Internasional
descriptionHtml:
From snack times to mealtimes, from routine bills to impulsive purchases, from online shopping to roadside stores - Pay everything and everywhere, with OVO!

That’s right – No more constraints of cash, all your transactions now are easy, quick, and secure with OVO.


Wanna see what’s inside?

> Pay Anything & Everything!
Use OVO to pay across our 500.000+ retail merchants, airtime, bills, parking, for all your services in Grab, and for all purchases in Tokopedia.

> Earn and Spend OVO Points Everywhere
1 OVO Point = Rp 1. Earn OVO Points when you transact and you can spend them everywhere OVO payment is accepted to enjoy incredible savings.

> Transfer to All Banks
Upgrade your account to OVO Premier to experience the ease of transferring to other users, or to all banks in Indonesia. Without queue.

> Easy Top-Up
Via Instant Top Up, ATM, internet / mobile banking, OVO Booth, Grab driver, or direct debit on the OVO application.

Download and experience the convenience, now!

Instagram.com/ovo_id
www.ovo.id
descriptionShort: Indonesia’s one app to pay everywhere.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Stay safe dan saatnya cobain yang terbaru dari OVO:

• Rekomendasi penawaran terupdate
Di akhir proses pembayaran, sekarang kamu bisa lihat berbagai penawaran yang cocok buat kamu.

• Akses OVO PayLater makin mudah!
Jangan bingung cari OVO PayLater di halaman depan, kini OVO PayLater bisa kamu akses di halaman Finance ya!

Ayo tetap beraktivitas #dirumahaja dan update OVO kamu sekarang!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Kamu tau nggak sih sekarang makin banyak yang jadi lebih dekat dengan keluarga karena WFH?
Makin banyak yang belanja kebutuhan sehari-hari via online?
Makin banyak yang belajar pake video call untuk pertama kali?
Dan makin banyak juga tagihan yang bisa kamu bayar di aplikasi OVO
Yap bener banget! Sekarang makin banyak tagihan yang bisa kamu bayar pake OVO. Mulai dari bayar telpon, PDAM, internet, dan TV kabel.
Makin banyak kan keseruan yang bisa kamu dapetin di OVO? Yuk update sekarang!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Kerja dari jarak jauh, bisa.
Belajar dari jarak jauh, bisa.
Silaturahmi apalagi…

Karena sekarang kamu bisa jajan dan belanja anti ribet dengan fitur upload QR code langsung dari aplikasi OVO! Nggak perlu lagi pake 2 HP buat scan, jadi makin gampang deh transaksi pake OVO!

Yuk, update aplikasi OVO sekarang!

title: OVO

creator: PT Visionet Internasional
descriptionHtml:
From snack times to mealtimes, from routine bills to impulsive purchases, from online shopping to roadside stores - Pay everything and everywhere, with OVO!

That’s right – No more constraints of cash, all your transactions now are easy, quick, and secure with OVO.


Wanna see what’s inside?

> Pay Anything & Everything!
Use OVO to pay across our 500.000+ retail merchants, airtime, bills, parking, for all your services in Grab, and for all purchases in Tokopedia.

> Earn and Spend OVO Points Everywhere
1 OVO Point = Rp 1. Earn OVO Points when you transact and you can spend them everywhere OVO payment is accepted to enjoy incredible savings.

> Transfer to All Banks
Upgrade your account to OVO Premier to experience the ease of transferring to other users, or to all banks in Indonesia. Without queue.

> Easy Top-Up
Via Instant Top Up, ATM, internet / mobile banking, OVO Booth, Grab driver, or direct debit on the OVO application.

Download and experience the convenience, now!

Instagram.com/ovo_id
www.ovo.id
descriptionShort: Indonesia’s one app to pay everywhere.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Asik! Bayar-bayaran di OVO makin praktis karena sekarang udah ada logo QRIS!
Kamu bisa bayar dengan upload QRIS dari galeri HP atau scan QRIS di merchant favorit.

Ada juga nih fitur terbaru dari OVO, mulai dari:
• Bayar biaya pendidikan sekolah, universitas hingga kursus
• Beli berbagai paket belajar sesuai kebutuhan
• Berdonasi buat dapet berkah lewat sedekah

Makin banyak ‘kan yang bisa kamu dapetin di OVO? Yuk, update sekarang!

title: OVO

creator: PT Visionet Internasional
descriptionHtml:
From snack times to mealtimes, from routine bills to impulsive purchases, from online shopping to roadside stores - Pay everything and everywhere, with OVO!

That’s right – No more constraints of cash, all your transactions now are easy, quick, and secure with OVO.


Wanna see what’s inside?

> Pay Anything & Everything!
Use OVO to pay across our 500.000+ retail merchants, airtime, bills, parking, for all your services in Grab, and for all purchases in Tokopedia.

> Earn and Spend OVO Points Everywhere
1 OVO Point = Rp 1. Earn OVO Points when you transact and you can spend them everywhere OVO payment is accepted to enjoy incredible savings.

> Transfer to All Banks
Upgrade your account to OVO Premier to experience the ease of transferring to other users, or to all banks in Indonesia. Without queue.

> Easy Top-Up
Via Instant Top Up, ATM, internet / mobile banking, OVO Booth, Grab driver, or direct debit on the OVO application.

Download and experience the convenience, now!

Instagram.com/ovo_id
www.ovo.id
descriptionShort: Indonesia’s one app to pay everywhere.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Selama PPKM darurat, saatnya kita semua saling jaga kesehatan orang sekitar.

Mulai lagi hindari kerumunan, rajin cuci tangan, dan batasi mobilitas jika memungkinkan.

Selagi kamu jaga kesehatan, OVO juga bersih-bersih biar sehat dan aman dari segala ancaman.

Yuk, langsung update OVO ke versi terbaru sekarang.

Ayo update sekarang!

creator: PT Visionet Internasional
descriptionHtml:
From snack times to mealtimes, from routine bills to impulsive purchases, from online shopping to roadside stores - Pay everything and everywhere, with OVO!

That’s right – No more constraints of cash, all your transactions now are easy, quick, and secure with OVO.


Wanna see what’s inside?

> Pay Anything & Everything!
Use OVO to pay across our 500.000+ retail merchants, airtime, bills, parking, for all your services in Grab, and for all purchases in Tokopedia.

> Earn and Spend OVO Points Everywhere
1 OVO Point = Rp 1. Earn OVO Points when you transact and you can spend them everywhere OVO payment is accepted to enjoy incredible savings.

> Transfer to All Banks
Upgrade your account to OVO Premier to experience the ease of transferring to other users, or to all banks in Indonesia. Without queue.

> Easy Top-Up
Via Instant Top Up, ATM, internet / mobile banking, OVO Booth, Grab driver, or direct debit on the OVO application.

Download and experience the convenience, now!

Instagram.com/ovo_id
www.ovo.id
descriptionShort: Indonesia’s one app to pay everywhere.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Bersih-bersih emang bikin makin nyaman. Setuju kan?

Nah itu juga yang dilakuin OVO di versi terbaru. Kami abis bersih-bersih biar transaksi kamu lebih stabil dan aman.

Gak usah tunggu lama, yuk update OVO kamu sekarang!

Hidup yang lebih teratur pasti bikin apa-apa serba gampang, malah jadi gak ada waktu yang kebuang sia-sia.

Kuy, update ke OVO versi terbaru!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
OVO ngerti kamu banget.

Setiap mau bayar tagihan kamu sering repot cari nomor tagihannya,
lupa nomornya disimpen di mana, atau bingung carinya ke mana. Ya, kan?

Nikmati antirepotnya transaksi tagihan dan pulsa di OVO versi terbaru!
Sekali transaksi, nomor tagihanmu auto kesimpen.
Jadi, transaksi kamu berikutnya bisa lebih gercep.

Bayar tagihan jadi ketagihan pake OVO, deh!
Yuk, update OVO kamu sekarang!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Makin yakin deh pake OVO lagi buat bayar tagihan dan keperluan pembayaran lainnya!

Soalnya, di OVO versi terbaru kamu bisa:
- Ganti no. HP yang terdaftar di akun OVO kamu secara mandiri sebelum login.
- Lihat promo yang lebih detail saat proses checkout tagihan dan berbagai pembayaran di OVO.
So pasti, kamu nggak perlu khawatir ketinggalan cuan kalo #PakeOVOaja.

Kuy, update OVO app ke versi terbaru sekarang!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Cari sosok yang serasi? OVO-lah yang kamu cari!

Soalnya OVO itu...
Pengertian, selalu dengerin kamu yang pengen ngerasa nyaman.
Selalu ada, buat bantu transaksi kamu lebih mudah.

Kita bagaikan asam dan garam, dan kita bertemu di genggaman
Pake OVO ternyata semudah itu~

Yuk, update OVO ke versi terbaru sekarang!

That’s right – No more constraints of cash, all your transactions now are easy, quick, and secure with OVO.


Wanna see what’s inside?

> Pay Anything & Everything!
Use OVO to pay across our 500.000+ retail merchants, airtime, bills, parking, for all your services in Grab, and for all purchases in Tokopedia.

> Earn and Spend OVO Points Everywhere
1 OVO Point = Rp 1. Earn OVO Points when you transact and you can spend them everywhere OVO payment is accepted to enjoy incredible savings.

> Transfer to All Banks
Upgrade your account to OVO Premier to experience the ease of transferring to other users, or to all banks in Indonesia. Without queue.

> Easy Top-Up
Via Instant Top Up, ATM, internet / mobile banking, OVO Booth, Grab driver, or direct debit on the OVO application.

Download and experience the convenience, now!

Instagram.com/ovo_id
www.ovo.id
descriptionShort: Indonesia’s one app to pay everywhere.

Hi hustlers and deal hunters,
good news from OVO for y’all!

Save your time,
Rest your fingers,
Now, paying with OVO is simpler and faster!

Be aware, this update may cause:
Spending your money in less time.
Secured transaction so you’ll be the only your money spender.
Higher chances to steal flash sale deals.
And many more.

We challenge you to click the update button faster than this new OVO transaction update. ;)
